subject: Shinsen Gumi Uniform
msgSnippet: I was wondering if anyone knows if a uniform for the Shinsen Gumi existed, and what it looked like.  I have seen movies that conflict with eachother, besides..

I was wondering if anyone knows if a uniform for the Shinsen Gumi 
existed, and what it looked like.  I have seen movies that conflict 
with eachother, besides.. they are movies, not to be taken as 
fact :D.  So I would like actual historical information as opposed to 
observations from movies.
